emissions.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '1 tbsp olive oil' is directly matched to 'olive oil' as it is the most direct and least processed form of olive oil available in the database. This aligns with the principle of choosing the least processed option when no specific processing is mentioned for the ingredient.

The ingredient '1 lb skinless, boneless chicken breast' is best matched to 'chicken, breast, flesh and skin, raw'. This is the most appropriate match because it represents the raw, unprocessed form of chicken breast, which aligns with the ingredient description. While 'chicken, breast, boiled, sliced' is also a breast option, it is more processed (boiled and sliced) than the raw option, making 'chicken, breast, flesh and skin, raw' a better fit for an unprocessed chicken breast.
emissions.closest_match_name: chicken, breast, flesh and skin, raw

emissions.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '2 medium carrots' is best matched to 'carrot, raw'. This is the most appropriate match because the ingredient specifies 'medium carrots' without any indication of processing (like freezing), making the raw option the most suitable and least processed choice.

The ingredient '2 stalks celery' is directly matched to 'celery, raw' as it is the most direct and least processed form of celery available in the database. This aligns with the principle of choosing the least processed option when no specific processing is mentioned for the ingredient.

The ingredient '1 red bell pepper' is best matched to 'pepper, sweet, red, raw'. This is the most appropriate match because the ingredient specifies 'red bell pepper' without any indication of processing, making the raw, sweet red pepper option the most suitable and least processed choice.

The ingredient '1 bunch scallions' is best matched to 'onions, spring, raw'. Scallions are also known as spring onions, and the raw option is the least processed, aligning with the ingredient description.

The ingredient '1 (15 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chiles' is best matched to 'tomato, peeled, canned'. This option is the most appropriate because the ingredient specifies 'canned diced tomatoes', and 'tomato, peeled, canned' is the closest match in terms of processing (canning) and form (tomato). While 'tomatojuice, canned' is also canned, it is a juice, not diced tomatoes. 'Beans, baked in tomato sauce, canned' and 'tuna, in tomato sauce, canned' are final meals or mixed ingredients, which are not suitable matches for a single ingredient like diced tomatoes.
emissions.ingredient: 1 (15 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chiles

emissions.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '2 (15 ounce) cans black beans' is directly matched to 'black beans'. This is the most appropriate match as it directly corresponds to the ingredient name and is a common form of black beans.

The ingredient '4 tbsp chili powder' is best matched to 'curry powder'. While there isn't a direct match for 'chili powder', 'curry powder' is the closest option as it is also a spice in powder form. 'Chili sauce' and 'pepper, hot chili, canned' are not suitable as they are not in powder form.

The ingredient '1 tbsp ground cumin' is best matched to 'curry powder'. While there isn't a direct match for 'ground cumin', 'curry powder' is the closest option as it is also a spice in powder form. This aligns with the rule of matching to a broader category or similar processed form when an exact match is not available. 'Coffee bean, roasted, ground' is not a spice, and 'black beans' and 'green curry paste' are not suitable matches for a ground spice.

The ingredient '2 tsp granulated garlic' is best matched to 'garlic, raw'. While 'granulated garlic' implies some processing, 'garlic, raw' is the least processed form of garlic available and is a reasonable common-sense match for a garlic product. 'Garlic in oil' is more processed, and 'garlic baguette, frozen' is a final meal, making 'garlic, raw' the most appropriate choice.

The ingredient '2 tsp onion powder' is best matched to 'onion, raw'. While 'onion powder' is a processed form of onion, 'onion, raw' is the least processed option available and is a reasonable common-sense match for an onion product. 'Onions, chopped, frozen' and 'onions, chopped and deepfried' are also processed but are not in powder form, making 'onion, raw' the most appropriate choice given the available options.
The ingredient 'ground black pepper' is directly matched to 'pepper, black'. This is the most appropriate match as it directly corresponds to the ingredient name and form.

The ingredient '1 (8.5 ounce) package dry corn muffin mix' is best matched to 'corn flour'. While 'corn muffin mix' is a prepared mix, 'corn flour' is the primary ingredient and the closest available option that represents the corn component.
